content.p: The School of Education offers a range of courses at undergraduate and postgraduate level as well as continuing professional development courses. Our part-time flexible provision allows you to fit study around your professional and family commitments. Find out more about studying at the School of Education. We also offer Person-Centred Experiential Counselling for Depression, a qualification recognised by the NHS which enhances career prospects for qualified therapists. Person-Centred Experiential Counselling for Depression
